attributes.action: Take steps to stop banks charging for services that are free at this time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The big banks and building societies are preparing us to accept the fact that their services will no longer be free. This will hit all of the population as we prepare to become a cashless society. The banks already make huge profits on overcharging. Do they or their shareholders really need to take from the poor to give to the rich?
